title: Trump’s memecoin drops to 75% below its all-time high after weekend tariff announcement
description: The price of bitcoin started falling shortly after Trump announced plans to start putting large tariffs on goods from Canada, Mexico and China.

title: Canadian charged with $65M crypto theft from DeFi protocols

title: Bitcoin Slides as US-China Trade War Escalation Rattles Markets
description: Bitcoin and other digital assets faced renewed selling pressure on Tuesday as trade tensions between the world’s two largest economies intensified, with the US and China imposing fresh tariffs on each other.
